Uses of Package
org.bishopireton.hanoi

  • Classes in org.bishopireton.hanoi used by org.bishopireton.hanoi
    Class
    Description
    ButtonInfo
    stores the information to create a button including its name and action listener
    Disk
    represents a disk for the towers of hanoi
    Footer
    A JPanel for the Towers of Hanoi animation.
    Hanoi
    The Hanoi class is the class that allows the Towers of Hanoi game to run.
    HanoiGraphics
    displays the Towers of Hanoi Graphics and allows user to choose starting spindle and number of disks
    IllegalDiskMoveException
    An exception to indicate if a disk cannot be properly moved
    IllegalSpindleSelectedException
    An exception to indicate if spindles were improperly selected
    Spindle
    represents a spindle for the towers of hanoi as a stack of disks
